channel.title: HKG:2007 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in HKG:2007 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Chinese Property Stocks Jump on Policy, Lending Boost
item.description: Chinese property shares surged in Hong Kong, led by Country Garden Holdings Co., as analysts pointed to a mix of policy signals and new lending rules as key drivers of the rally.
